代码高亮

  • 代码块, 你想高亮语法吗, 你想直接把代码复制拷贝到文件中吗, 使用代码块 <code java> javaCodes </code> 即可显示高亮
  • 使用<file java mytest.java> javaCodes </java>还可以直接下载mytest.java文件
  • 如果不想code被解析,可以使用<nowiki> code </nowiki>
  •     /** 
     * The HelloWorldApp class implements an application that
     * simply displays "Hello World!" to the standard output.
     */
    class HelloWorldApp {
        public static void main(String[] args) {
            System.out.println("Hello World!"); //Display the string.
        }
    }
 
  • 可以识别的语法有 4cs, abap, actionscript-french, actionscript, actionscript3, ada, apache, applescript, asm, asp, autohotkey, autoit, avisynth, awk, bash, basic4gl, bf, bibtex, blitzbasic, bnf, boo, c, c_mac, caddcl, cadlisp, cfdg, cfm, cil, clojure, cmake, cobol, cpp, cpp-qt, csharp, css, cuesheet, d, dcs, delphi, diff, div, dos, dot, eiffel, email, erlang, fo, fortran, freebasic, fsharp, gambas, genero, gdb, glsl, gml, gnuplot, groovy, gettext, haskell, hq9plus, html, idl, ini, inno, intercal, io, java5, java, javascript, jquery, kixtart, klonec, klonecpp, latex, lisp, locobasic, logtalk, lolcode, lotusformulas, lotusscript, lscript, lsl2, lua, m68k, make, mapbasic, matlab, mirc, modula3, mmix, mpasm, mxml, mysql, newlisp, nsis, oberon2, objc, ocaml-brief, ocaml, oobas, oracle8, oracle11, pascal, perl, perl6, per, php-brief, php, pike, pic16, pixelbender, plsql, povray, powerbuilder, powershell, progress, prolog, properties, providex, purebasic, python, qbasic, rails, rebol, reg, robots, rsplus, ruby, sas, scala, scheme, scilab, sdlbasic, smalltalk, smarty, sql, systemverilog, tcl, teraterm, text, thinbasic, tsql, typoscript, vbnet, vb, verilog, vhdl, vim, visualfoxpro, visualprolog, whitespace, winbatch, whois, xml, xorg_conf, xpp, z80
  • 表格只需要^标题^和|单元格|即可, 多个^或|表示合并单元格
